head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BIRD, HOWARD, JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BIRD, HOWARD, JR.

block.p: BIRD-Howard, Jr. 84. Of New Canaan, Conn. Beloved husband of Shirley Hasler, devoted father of: Frederick, Norman, Michael and Susan. Loving grandfather of Alden and Hayden Bird. Memorial service will be at 11AM at St. Mark's Episcopal Church in New Canaan, Conn. on Friday, 8th of September, 2000. Contributions in memory of Howard may be made to either the New Canaan Historical Society, 13 Oenoke Ridge, or to St. Mark's Music Fund at St. Mark's Episcopal Church, 111 Oenoke Ridge: New Canaan, Conn. 06840.
